title: Brand Refresh and Design System Refactor
description: Memorial Sloan Kettering is one of the top cancer research and treatment institues. I helped implement a massive code refactor and brand refresh. This included a complete component library rebuild and migration from Pattern Lab to our system Knapsack, as well as modernization of tooling and processes. In addition to working on the front end, I also consulted on and helped implemented QA automation.
deliverables: Audit of the existing system, interface inventory, and roadmap
QA automation, CI/CD, Cypress, and reporting
